rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Each arrow in the grid indicates that the sum of the first ‘n’ digits along the direction pointed by the arrow is equal to the digit in the cell for some value of ‘n’. All arrows are not marked.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each arrow in the grid indicates that the sum of the first ‘n’ digits along the direction pointed by the arrow is equal to the digit in the cell for some value of ‘n’. All arrows are not marked.
